original: 東吳廬陵一帶的山越首領，或作李恆。李桓與羅厲等在廬陵叛亂，孫權命呂岱率軍征討。李桓、羅厲分別被吾粲、唐咨所俘虜，旋即俱被斬首。
text: The leader of Shanyue in the Luling area of the Eastern Wu, or Li Heng. Li Huan and Luo Li rebelled in Luling, and Sun Quan ordered Lu Dai to lead an army to conquer. Li Huan and Luo Li were captured by Wu Can and Tang Zi respectively, and were immediately beheaded.
